civilopediaText.text: Alliance flora and fauna utilisation base that can be built in water or land. Fully automatic therefore maximising all 3 dimensional space.

name: Airfield Base
uniques: [Aerocraft] Units in this tile heal [15] HP per turn when healing
Can be built just outside your borders
Constructing it will take over the tiles around it and assign them to your closest city

civilopediaText.text: Alliance base equiped with four-way airline for aerocraft to take off and repair station for aerocraft.

name: AGM Base
uniques: Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+4 Production, +4 Gold]

civilopediaText.text: AGM or Aquatic Ground Mining Base is Alliance mining base built on aquatic area to mine mineral located on aquatic ground.
